lines.text: Newt? Dobbs, that was your mother's name. Call. That's Scot's, so they tell me. It's had no dishonor I'm aware of.
Leave it to Augustus... first man I know who could get himself into a shootin' scrape after he was dead.

[to Woodrow]
I'd forgotten how truly perverse you can be.
We ain't here for a long time; we're here for a good time.
For a dull man, Woodrow manages to stir up a heap of trouble.

[to Woodrow]
It's a sad woman needs anything from you.
Barbed wire draws a nasty line, mister.
Did you ever want anything so bad you'd do anything to get it?
